# Boilerplate Agent

Minimal agent template — the best starting point for new projects.

**Source:** [`examples/agent-boilerplate`](https://github.com/AgentlyHQ/aixyz/tree/main/examples/agent-boilerplate)

## What It Does

A unit conversion agent that converts values between metric, imperial, and other measurement systems. Demonstrates the standard aixyz agent structure with multiple tools.

## Structure

```
agent-boilerplate/
  aixyz.config.ts       # Agent identity, payment, and skills
  app/
    agent.ts            # ToolLoopAgent with gpt-4o-mini
    tools/
      length.ts         # Length/distance conversion
      temperature.ts    # Temperature conversion (°C, °F, K)
      weight.ts         # Weight/mass conversion
    icon.png            # Agent icon
  vercel.json           # Vercel deployment config
```

## Key Features

- **Auto-generated server** — no `server.ts` needed
- **Three tools** — length, temperature, and weight conversion
- **x402 payments** — agent priced at `$0.001` per request
- **Skills declared** in config for A2A agent card discovery

## Configuration

```ts
const config: AixyzConfig = {
  name: "Unit Conversion Agent",
  description: "AI agent that converts values between metric, imperial, and other measurement systems.",
  version: "0.1.0",
  x402: {
    payTo: "0x...",
    network: process.env.NODE_ENV === "production" ? "eip155:8453" : "eip155:84532",
  },
  skills: [
    { id: "convert-length", name: "Convert Length", ... },
    { id: "convert-weight", name: "Convert Weight", ... },
    { id: "convert-temperature", name: "Convert Temperature", ... },
  ],
};
```

## Running

```bash
cd examples/agent-boilerplate
bun install
bun run dev
```
